content:
Looking through my drone photos and I suddenly spotted text on the roof of a restaurant, turns out it was a bunch of solar panels spelling "TOK".

This restaurant is called "Juffrouw Tok", meaning "Miss Bawk" (or "Cluck", or whatever the onomatopoeia for chicken is).

The funny part is.. I don't think this is visible from ground level, at least I have never seen it..
